item.title: API
item.description: Apache Kafka includes new java clients (in the org.apache.kafka.clients package). These are meant to supplant the older Scala clients, but for compatability they will co-exist for some time. These clients are available in a seperate jar with minimal dependencies, while the old Scala clients remain packaged with the server. Producer API We encourage all new development to use the new Java producer. This client is production tested and generally both faster and more fully featured than the previous Scala client.
